marker.comment: Anchored in Big Wahneen Bay. Lots of other boats. Canada Day tomorrow
In Big Wahneen Bay waiting on weather. NW @ 30 kts.
Docked in Perry Sound, pop. 6,000. Major city for area.
Anchored SE part of Shawanaga Is. after lite air sail from Parry Sound.
Anchored E of Raspberry Is. awaiting calmer wx for crossing shallows
Docked @ Wright''s Marina, Byng Inlet after day crossing shallows
Anchored in Bustard Islands. Blueberries! Yum, yum
Docked in Killarney. Hot, fair weather for several days now.
Anchored off Snake Island in Strawberry Chanel. Hot and muggy.
Docked in Little Current, pop. 600; major city for area. 95 deg. today!
In Little Current awaiting autopilot part coming tomorrow. HOT!!!
Anchored Bedford Harbour, North Channel. Autopilot fixed. Yippee!!
Anchored South Harbour, Hotham Island, North Channel.
Anchored John Harbour, John Island, North Channel. Nice weather
Underway to Meldrum Bay, Manitoulin Island in fine (hot) wx
Docked in Meldrum Bay, Manitoulin Island after good day of sailing.
Under power in zero wind to Drummond Island.
Cleared Customs at Drummond Is. Now docked in DeTour Village, MI
Anchored in Government Bay, Les Cheneaux Islands, MI
Docked at St. Ignace after hard beat to weather yesterday in 25 kts.
Beating west toward Grays Reef. Beautiful weather.
Anchored in Oyster Bay, Lake Charlevoix at 0010 this morning. Full moon.
Rafted with the Chicago to Mackinac fleet in Leland, MI
Anchored in Betsie Lake, Frankfort, MI.
Anchored off Frankfort, MI. awaiting favorable weather for crossing
Underway to Manitowoc
Arrived in Manitowoc at 1900 this evening - just prior to T''storms
Haulout on 10/28. Back in May. Have a great winter!
